column4: Tesla says lawsuits may delay SolarCity deal
column5: Tesla Motors Inc  said on Monday its proposed acquisition of SolarCity Corp  could be delayed because of shareholder lawsuits alleging board members breached their fiduciary duty  the latest hurdle to a $2.6 billion deal.

column4: CORRECTED-UPDATE 1-Tesla says lawsuits could delay SolarCity deal
column5: Sept 19 Elon Musk-led Tesla Motor Inc  said on Monday its proposed acquisition of SolarCity Corp  could be delayed due to shareholder lawsuits challenging the deal.

column4: Intel hires Robert Swan from General Atlantic as CFO
column5: Intel Corp named Robert Swan chief financial officer  replacing company veteran Stacy Smith who is moving to a new role leading sales  manufacturing and operations.

column4: UPDATE 1-Intel hires Robert Swan from General Atlantic as CFO
column5: Sept 19 Intel Corp named Robert Swan chief financial officer  replacing company veteran Stacy Smith who is moving to a new role leading sales  manufacturing and operations.

column4: BRIEF-Intel Corp says Robert Swan will receive a hiring bonus
column5: * Intel Corp says in connection with his appointment  Robert Swan will receive a hiring bonus of $5.5 million
